DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Asia . The aim trial investigate pharmacokinetics ( exposure trial drug body ) , pharmacodynamics ( effect investigate drug body ) , safety tolerability semaglutide healthy male Japanese Caucasian subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Assess Pharmacokinetics , Pharmacodynamics , Safety Tolerability Semaglutide Healthy Male Japanese Caucasian Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male Japanese Caucasian subject Age 20 55 year ( inclusive ) time sign informed consent Body weight equal 54.0 kg Body mass index ( BMI ) 20.0 25.0 kg/m^2 ( inclusive ) Glycosylated haemoglobin A1c ( HbA1c ) equal 6.0 % For Japanese subject : parent Japanese For Caucasian subject : parent Caucasian Any clinically significant disease history , opinion investigator , systemic organ disease include : cardiological , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , hepatic , neurologic , renal , genitourinary endocrine , dermatologic hematologic diseases Personal family history medullary thyroid carcinoma multiple endocrine neoplasia syndrome type 2 ( MEN2 ) History chronic pancreatitis idiopathic acute pancreatitis Calcitonin equal 50 ng/L History alcohol abuse within 1 year screening , positive result alcohol breath test , consumption 21 unit alcohol weekly : 1 unit alcohol equal approximately 250 mL beer lager , approximately120 mL ( one glass ) wine Japanese sake , approximately 20 mL spirit Smoking 5 cigarette ( include nicotine substitute product ) equivalent , per day unwilling refrain smoke whenever require trial procedure Use prescription drug within 3 week 5 time halflife , whichever longer , prior Visit 2 ( randomisation ) , nonprescription drug within 1 week prior Visit 2 ( randomisation ) . The use vitamin , mineral nutritional supplement , occasional use paracetamol ( acetaminophen ) acetylsalicylic acid permit
